original: Hetuyā pañca, vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
Nokilesaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nanokilesaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁no kiles aṃ ▁nahetu ṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁pe ▁na no kiles aṃ ▁nahetu ṃ ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
